name: Arma 3 Mute
tagline: System tray application for streamers and anyone who wants to mute lobby in Battle Royale
body:
### Arma 3 Mute

This project is for muting Arma 3 - [Battle Royale](http://battleroyalegames.com/) Mod by [PLAYERUNKNOWN](https://twitter.com/BattleRoyaleMod)

##**Download the [Latest Release](https://github.com/SresgaminG/Arma3Mute/releases) here**##
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
